item.title: Certifications
item.description: This is a stub, on a Russian version of this blog you may read a post in which I analyze the following certifications: 1Z0-808 1Z0-819 1Z0-909 1Z0-071 RHCSA If you are interested in what I’m thinking about those certifications and their requirements - feel free to go there. If you are interested in learning more about said certifications - then I can only advise you to follow the links and read info from the original sources.
